channel.title: ESP32 on Lean Deep Tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in ESP32 on Lean Deep Tech blog

item.title: Run Rust code on ESP32
item.description: In this brief article, we will explore how to set up the ESP32 development environment to build and run Rust code on the ESP-WROOM-32. This procedure is written to work on Ubuntu 22 with a 64-bit Intel processor. The ESP32 is connected to the PC via USB. Installation Install Ubuntu packages sudo apt install -y build-essential libssl-dev pkg-config git sudo apt install -y python3-pip python3-venv Configure USB permissions sudo usermod -aG dialout $USER sudo usermod -aG tty $USER # Restart the session Install Rust
